original_text: Ye have multiplied your slain in this city, and ye have filled the streets thereof with the slain.
korean_text: 너희가 이 성읍에서 많이 죽여 그 거리를 시체로 채웠도다

sentences.original_text: Ye have multiplied your slain in this city,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 성에서 살해당한 자들을 불렸고,

sentences.original_text: and ye have filled the streets thereof with the slain.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 거리들도 살해당한 자들로 가득 채웠느니라.
